about_the_game:
The Millionaire's Club Pack includes:

EP Power Pack:
50000000 EP will be added

Wealth Pack:
5000000 EP has been added
- 30 Coins have been added
- 1000000 added to all Arcanium

Arcanium Power Pack:
5000000 added to all Arcanium

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
